author: Phelpe

text:
Of course, props to you for making it as well as you did.
A nice addition would be putting the guitars in the same speakers, because they're not supposed to sound separate. They're supposed to resonate and fall on chords at the same time: two different beats being in sync every few moments.
Without that they sound too separated.

Nice job, though.
author: Krusty Kraken

text: Krusty Kraken That is an effect I actually went for on purpose, even if it's not in the original.

author: guering

text:
Such a beautiful piece.
With an unbelievable amount of nostalgia.
This feels like a piece where if you have never even listened to it, it would still have a nostalgic effect. Especially the beautiful melody at 0:58.

Just perfect...

Great job on covering this!

Have you thought about composing pieces?
